statements: SELECT * FROM kitchen_inventory ORDER BY tool_name DESC
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT tool_name, location FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE location = 'Pantry'
SELECT * FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE tool_name LIKE '%knife%'
SELECT tool_name, quantity, location FROM kitchen_inventory
SELECT * FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, quantity FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE location = 'Pantry' ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT tool_name, location FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE location = 'Cabinet' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT tool_id, quantity FROM kitchen_inventory WHERE tool_name LIKE 'Knife%';
SELECT * FROM kitchen_tools;
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM kitchen_tools WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT tool_name, tool_category FROM kitchen_tools ORDER BY tool_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_tools WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM kitchen_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Cutlery';
SELECT * FROM kitchen_tools WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY tool_id DESC;
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM kitchen_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Cutlery' ORDER BY tool_name;
SELECT tool_name, quantity, tool_category FROM kitchen_tools WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY tool_category, quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT tool_category FROM kitchen_tools WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY tool_category;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Cooking' ORDER BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM KitchenTools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_type, stored_location FROM KitchenTools WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM KitchenEquipment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, quantity_change FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE quantity_change < 0;
SELECT tool_name, tool_type, quantity, stored_location FROM KitchenTools WHERE tool_type = 'Knife';
SELECT * FROM KitchenTools;
SELECT tool_name, quantity, stored_location FROM KitchenTools WHERE tool_type = 'Cutting';
SELECT * FROM KitchenEquipment WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, depreciation_status FROM KitchenEquipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Cooking' AND depreciation_status = false;
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, quantity, stored_location FROM KitchenTools JOIN InventoryTransactions ON KitchenTools.tool_id = InventoryTransactions.tool_id WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM KitchenTools;
SELECT tool_name, price, quantity FROM KitchenTools ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM KitchenEquipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM KitchenEquipment WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM ToolInventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM KitchenTools;
SELECT tool_name, price FROM KitchenTools WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM KitchenTools WHERE price < 50;
SELECT tool_name, price * quantity AS total_price FROM KitchenTools WHERE tool_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT t.tool_name, i.quantity FROM KitchenTools t JOIN ToolInventory i ON t.tool_id = i.tool_id WHERE i.quantity > 5 ORDER BY t.tool_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_tools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_category, price FROM kitchen_tools WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, quantity FROM kitchen_tools ORDER BY tool_name DESC;
SELECT tool_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM kitchen_tools GROUP BY tool_name;
SELECT * FROM tool_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_tools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_category, quantity FROM kitchen_tools WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY tool_category DESC;
SELECT tool_name, price FROM kitchen_tools WHERE tool_category = 'Cutlery' AND quantity > 10;
SELECT tool_name, quantity, price * quantity AS total_price FROM kitchen_tools WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tools, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM kitchen_tools;
